participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and anxious, she often worries about the future but finds comfort in baking and her pets.
participant_1.background: i am scared of dying. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Passionate and energetic, he enjoys sharing his love for music and engaging with kids through teaching.
participant_2.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i am an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers. i love to play board games.
